amendment.description: Strike all after the enacting clause and insert the following: SECTION 1. SHORT TITLE. This Act may be cited as the "Air and Health Quality Empowerment Zone Designation Act of 2017". ***.
amendment.purpose: Amendment in the nature of a substitute.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McNerney amendment (A006) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A006) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. McNerney.
